description:
Hibari’s last hope of defeating the Phantom Knight is…a drunk hedgehog? Emerging from Hibari`s box, the continually burping, clumsy Cloud Hedgehog has absorbed too many flames and gotten indigestion. But when Hibari calmly holds his hand out and the Cloud Hedgehog stabs it with its needles something unimaginable happens!
Source: crunchyroll
